<h2><a name="_statement_of_purpose"></a>Statement of Purpose</h2>
<p>When given a large, arbitrary separated input file, determine:</p>
<ol type="1">
<li>
<p>
Initial columns
</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>
Appropriate database data types
</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>
Quotation status
</p>
</li>
</ol>
<p>For all lines.</p>
<p><a href="/doc/tip/doc/input_doc.wiki">Input Functions Documentation.</a></p>
